name: app_tokens
title: App Tokens
description: Learn how to create, view, and delete App Tokens

recipe_steps.title: Getting your App Tokens
recipe_steps.tip: App Tokens are used for generating Kaltura Sessions, and can control what privileges are granted to the user. Use ```appToken.list``` to see all of your app tokens.

recipe_steps.title: Creating a new App Token
recipe_steps.tip: Create a new app token by calling ```appToken.add```.  You can choose whether the session should have ADMIN or USER level privileges, and you can specify how long the session should last.
